Text:
(Staying in the hotel suite for free last night was
awesome.)

(I got totally full from the breakfast buffet, and
I can have a morning soak, enjoy the sauna,
or get a massage, whatever I want.)

(It's all about having friends in the right places.
From what I hear, Mitsugoshi is opening a beauty
salon for the upper crust. I'm just being allowed to
try it out.)

(I guess the idea came out of my stories about
salons and cosmetic surgery. Well, it's one way
to make some money.)
...Oh well.
(If I try to get the story straight in my head...)

(Rose's mom is Perv's hostage, and her movements
are being monitored closely.)

(I guess that's something I should be concerned
about, but really it's more about Rose's aesthetics.)

(That makes the story simple. It's just a matter of
making a shadowbroker move and freeing the hostage.)

(If I do that, her shackles will come off and she'll
be one step closer to becoming a legendary queen.)
I was worried about you yesterday, Mr. Apprentice.

I couldn't sleep at all, thinking you might have
gotten lost.
Oh, really.

Recently, there have been strange guards roaming
around, and it's not exactly safe inside the castle.
Oh, really.

But you don't need to worry. That stal...that scary
person is gone now.
Oh, really.

There have been accusations of food theft. No-one
saw who did it, but everyone knows who it was.
Oh...really?

(Hmm? Speaking of, I did do a similar number
yesterday...nah, that can't be it.)

I...I did my best for you, Mr. Apprentice.
I will protect you.

Even from a scary stalker pretending to be a master
to try and squander your talents—
Whose—
Whose talent will be squandered...?
Oh, Lady Shiron. Is the concert still going?
I'm on a break.

You're making me worried that someone is interfering
with my dear pupil's work.
That is an unnecessary worry, I think.
I am here to properly support your apprentice.
Maybe I should speak in a way you'll understand?
Do you really think you have a chance?
My, how frightening...
(Natural versus woman-made.)

(I guess no country is safe from this kind
of conflict.)
War could break out at any moment,
but everyone seems so carefree.

For some reason the people in the castle aren't
nervous either.

This nation's aristocrats despise violence and adore
the arts, just as they have throughout Oriana's
history.
All because of the Black Rose...
A black rose...?
Us!
We are sworn to the Black Rose!

We are sworn to the Black Rose! We are sworn to
the Black Rose!
(There's something off about that...)
Well, if it's real, I'd like to see it.
Are you sure?!
Yeah. It's here, isn't it?
Well, yes...

It's...extremely dangerous. But if your aim is to
destroy it...

I mean, if that is what you would choose,
Master Shadow...
Heh.
(That's Epsilon for you.)

(I'm just interested in looking at a flower bed,
but she always makes a huge deal out of
everything.)

(Although I am fascinated with these black roses,
first I need to find Queen Reina.)
